Author: JayceOfSpades
Name: Mini-Mappingway
Description: A plugin to show your friends and FC members on the minimap. Customise the markers and toggle whether you want to see friends, FC members, or both, in the settings! IMPORTANT: If you have your minimap rotation locked, please enable 'Minimap Locked' in the settings.
Punchline: A plugin to show your friends and FC members on the minimap
